Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS
AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO CIVIL SERVICE AND PENSIONS

Title: Relates to establishing a temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees who are above age fifty-five and with twenty-five years of service
Summary: Establishes a temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees who are above age fifty-five and with twenty-five years of service.
ActClause: AN ACT to provide temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees
